definition: enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 丰富的马笼头皮革饰边。

sentences.english: Change to a long electrode bridle.
All you will need for the games is your horse, a hope halter and a long lead rope.
sentences.chinese: 所有您需要的游戏是你的马，希望笼头和长期铅绳。

sentences.english: Don ' t forget -font saddles and bridles!
sentences.chinese: 别忘了你的马鞍和马笼头。

sentences.english: Water is dripping from that leaky faucet.
sentences.chinese: 水正从漏水的笼头滴下来。

sentences.english: Fill in the bridle with silicone.
Case is crafted from French bridle leather with raw-edge construction.
sentences.chinese: 制作的案例是来自法国的马笼头皮革原料边建设。

sentences.english: He harnessed the horse to a wagon.
This horse is wearing a grooming halter.
sentences.chinese: 图中的马带了一个梳洗用笼头。

sentences.english: Another type of collar that may be effective is a halter collar.
sentences.chinese: 另一种是蓝领，可有效预防是一个笼头衣领。

sentences.english: Lay the chain over the top of the noseband of the halter.
sentences.chinese: 把链子放在笼头鼻革的上方。

sentences.english: A horse should NEVER be tied with a chain.
sentences.chinese: 绝对不要用笼头链来栓马。

sentences.english: Attach the snap to the upper halter ring on the off side.
sentences.chinese: 把扣索扣在外侧位于稍上方的笼头环。

sentences.english: This design has innovatively taken as a whole the traditional bridle and the rotatable subs.
sentences.chinese: 本设计创新性地将传统马笼头与旋转短节合二为一。

sentences.english: Your horse has been haltered up.
Never tie by the bridle, either using the reins or tying the bit.
sentences.chinese: 从不栓马笼头，也不可栓缰或短距离拴马。

definition: to unscrew/to twist off (a lid)/to turn on (a faucet)/to switch on (by turning a knob)/to turn (a door handle)/to wrench apart
to ladle water/to scoop up water
container for holding and pouring water (or other liquid): jug, pitcher, clay jar, jerry can, water bottle etc
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
